issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Titanium.UI.AUTOLINK_MAP_ADDRESSES not working on android >= 4.4

*Steps to Reproduce*
1. Install KS.Navigate to Controls>Label>Autolink
2. Tap on Map Addresses.

{color:green}Expected Result:{color}
2. Map address should be highlighted on the Contact info.

{color:red}Actual Result:{color}
2. Map address does not get highlighted.

Working fine on Android Nexus7(v4.3),LG-P970(v4.0.4)
Not working on Nexus7(v4.4.4),Nexus5(v4.4.4)
fields.summary: Android: Titanium.UI.AUTOLINK_MAP_ADDRESSES not working on android >= 4.4

Appcelerator-Studio:3.3.0.201406231625

acs:1.0.14
alloy:1.4.0-rc2
npm:1.3.2
titanium:3.3.0-rc3
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1
xcode:5.1.1
OS:Maverick(10.9.3)
Device:Nexus5(v4.4.4)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
